MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG1 and DG12 postcode areas of Dumfries and Annan. Following a previous power cut, It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:45pm in order to allow safe working conditions whilst our team continue repairing an overhead line fault near Greenfield Farm. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:13pm on Friday, 12 March 2021
